name: sweetcherry
description: Clone of Switchery adapted for React.

scripts.build:umd:prod: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.umd.config.js -i src/index.js -o dist/sweetcherry.min.js
scripts.build:umd:dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c rollup.umd.config.js -i src/index.js -o dist/sweetcherry.js
scripts.clean: rimraf es && rimraf lib && rimraf dist
scripts.precommit: lint-staged && run-p build:umd:** && git add dist
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Dmitry Shlensky <shld@list.ru>
